name: Rocketto
description:
A game about a little rocketto in space fighting against some evil people.

Controls:

Rotate -> 'a' 'd'

Thrust -> 'Space'

Shoot -> 'Left Control'

(Got no time to do a lot of things so I rushed the majority of the game as I could in so little time I got available, sorry about that)
